description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省下辖县，由淮安市代管。
description.en: A county in Jiangsu Province, China, administered by Huai'an City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，中国共产党执政。
description.en: A country in East Asia, governed by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 涟水县人民政府所在地。
description.en: The seat of the Lianshui County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋时期位于长江下游地区的诸侯国。
description.en: A state in the lower Yangtze River region during the Spring and Autumn period of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋战国时期的诸侯国。
description.en: A state during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋战国时期位于长江流域的诸侯国。
description.en: A state in the Yangtze River region during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上第一个大一统封建王朝。
description.en: The first unified feudal dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的郡名。
description.en: An ancient commandery in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一个朝代，分为西汉和东汉。
description.en: A dynasty in ancient China, divided into the Western Han and Eastern Han.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝开国功臣，军事家。
description.en: A founding father and military strategist of the Han Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第七位皇帝。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 位于今涟水县境内的古县名，于公元前117年设置。
description.en: An ancient county located in present-day Lianshui County, established in 117 BC.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一种行政区划单位。
description.en: A type of administrative division unit in China.

description.zh-cn: 新朝的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Xin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的郡名。
description.en: An ancient commandery in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上承南北朝、下启唐朝的朝代。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty that preceded the Tang dynasty and followed the Southern and Northern Dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一个重要朝代。
description.en: An important dynasty in ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝初期在今涟水县境内设置的州。
description.en: A prefecture established in present-day Lianshui County during the early Tang Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一个州。
description.en: An ancient prefecture in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上承五代十国、下启元朝的时代。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history that followed the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period and preceded the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝由涟水县升格而成的行政区划。
description.en: An administrative division in the Song Dynasty, upgraded from Lianshui County.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由汉族建立的最后一个大一统王朝。
description.en: The last unified dynasty in Chinese history established by the Han people.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一个府。
description.en: An ancient prefecture in China.

description.zh-cn: 于1912年在中国大陆成立的共和制国家。
description.en: A republican state founded in mainland China in 1912.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的省份。
description.en: A province during the Republic of China era.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国第七次全国人口普查

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第七次全国人口普查

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府于2020年进行的全国性人口普查。
description.en: A nationwide census conducted by the government of the People's Republic of China in 2020.

description.zh-cn: 连接江苏省连云港市和镇江市的高速铁路。
description.en: A high-speed railway connecting Lianyungang and Zhenjiang in Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 位于涟水县的连镇铁路上的一个车站。
description.en: A station on the Lianyungang-Zhenjiang High-Speed Railway located in Lianshui County.

description.zh-cn: 中国为保障粮食供给而划定的重要粮食生产区域。
description.en: Key grain production areas designated by China to ensure food supply.

description.zh-cn: 涟水县下辖镇。
description.en: A town under the jurisdiction of Lianshui County.

description.zh-cn: 位于江苏省涟水县高沟镇的酿酒企业，为上市公司。
description.en: A publicly listed brewing company located in Gaogou Town, Lianshui County, Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 位于涟水县的国家重点示范高中。
description.en: A national key model high school located in Lianshui County.

description.zh-cn: 位于涟水县的省重点示范高中。
description.en: A provincial key model high school located in Lianshui County.

description.zh-cn: 位于涟水县的全日制民办高等院校。
description.en: A full-time private higher vocational college located in Lianshui County.

description.zh-cn: 位于涟水县的中等专业学校。
description.en: A secondary vocational school located in Lianshui County.

description.zh-cn: 位于涟水县的寺庙，始建于唐初。
description.en: A temple in Lianshui County, first built in the early Tang Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 涟水县由淮安市代管。
description.en: Lianshui County is administered by Huai'an City.

description.zh-cn: 淮安市是江苏省下辖的地级市。
description.en: Huai'an is a prefecture-level city under the jurisdiction of Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 涟水县是中华人民共和国江苏省的一个县。
description.en: Lianshui County is a county in Jiangsu Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 春秋战国时期，涟水境先属吴国。
description.en: During the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods, the territory of Lianshui first belonged to the State of Wu.

description.zh-cn: 春秋战国时期，涟水境后属越国。
description.en: During the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods, the territory of Lianshui later belonged to the State of Yue.

description.zh-cn: 春秋战国时期，涟水境再属楚国。
description.en: During the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods, the territory of Lianshui subsequently belonged to the State of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝时涟水境属东海郡。
description.en: During the Qin Dynasty, the territory of Lianshui belonged to Donghai Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝初年，涟水境属韩信的封地楚国。
description.en: In the early Han Dynasty, the territory of Lianshui was part of Han Xin's fiefdom, the State of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝元狩六年（公元前117年）在涟水境设置淮浦县。
description.en: In 117 BC (the sixth year of the Yuanshou era), Emperor Wu of Han established Huaipu County in the territory of Lianshui.

description.zh-cn: 王莽时期改淮浦县为淮敬县。
description.en: During the reign of Wang Mang, Huaipu County was renamed Huaijing.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期淮浦县隶属广陵郡。
description.en: During the Three Kingdoms period, Huaipu County was subordinate to Guangling Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 隋开皇五年（585年）改襄贲为涟水县，这是涟水的始称。
description.en: In 585 AD (the fifth year of the Kaihuang era of the Sui Dynasty), Xiangben was renamed Lianshui County, which was the first time the name 'Lianshui' was used.

description.zh-cn: 唐武德四年（621年）在涟水境置涟州。
description.en: In 621 AD (the fourth year of the Wude era of the Tang Dynasty), Lian Prefecture was established in the territory of Lianshui.

description.zh-cn: 唐贞观元年（627年）废涟州。
description.en: In 627 AD (the first year of the Zhenguan era of the Tang Dynasty), Lian Prefecture was abolished.

description.zh-cn: 唐贞观元年（627年）废涟州后，涟水县划归泗州管辖。
description.en: After the abolition of Lian Prefecture in 627 AD (the first year of the Zhenguan era), Lianshui County was placed under the jurisdiction of Si Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 宋太平兴国三年（978年）涟水县升为涟水郡。
description.en: In 978 AD (the third year of the Taiping Xingguo era of the Song Dynasty), Lianshui County was upgraded to Lianshui Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 明洪武二年（1369年）涟水境改称安东县。
description.en: In 1369 AD (the second year of the Hongwu era of the Ming Dynasty), the territory of Lianshui was renamed Andong County.

description.zh-cn: 明朝时期，改称安东县的涟水属淮安府。
description.en: During the Ming Dynasty, Lianshui, renamed Andong County, belonged to Huai'an Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国三年（1914年），因与奉天省安东县同名，复名涟水县。
description.en: In 1914 (the third year of the Republic of China), its name was reverted to Lianshui County because it shared the same name as Andong County in Fengtian Province.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国第七次全国人口普查

description.zh-cn: 根据第七次全国人口普查数据，截至2020年11月1日零时，涟水县常住人口为829699人。
description.en: According to the data from the Seventh National Population Census, as of 00:00 on November 1, 2020, the resident population of Lianshui County was 829,699.

description.zh-cn: 连镇铁路在涟水县设涟水站。
description.en: The Lianyungang-Zhenjiang High-Speed Railway has a station, Lianshui Station, in Lianshui County.

description.zh-cn: 涟水县是全国商品粮生产基地县之一。
description.en: Lianshui County is one of the National Commodity Grain Production Base counties.

description.zh-cn: 酿酒业是涟水工业经济的支柱，今世缘是其骨干企业。
description.en: The brewing industry is the pillar of Lianshui's industrial economy, and Jinshiyuan is its backbone enterprise.

description.zh-cn: 今世缘公司位于高沟镇。
description.en: The Jinshiyuan company is located in Gaogou Town.

description.zh-cn: 涟水中学是位于涟水县的学校。
description.en: Lianshui High School is a school located in Lianshui County.

description.zh-cn: 郑梁梅高级中学是位于涟水县的学校。
description.en: Zheng Liangmei Senior High School is a school located in Lianshui County.

description.zh-cn: 炎黄职业技术学院是位于涟水县的院校。
description.en: Yanhuang Vocational and Technical College is an institution located in Lianshui County.

description.zh-cn: 涟水中等专业学校是位于涟水县的学校。
description.en: Lianshui Secondary Vocational School is a school located in Lianshui County.

description.zh-cn: 能仁寺是位于涟水县的寺庙。
description.en: Nengren Temple is a temple located in Lianshui County.
